name: Potrick Snap
description:
Story 
you clean potrick house but there is something strange in the house but potrick did't want to tell you what happend in this house

How to play : 
   W
A S D : Move
F : Flashlight
V : Lighter 
E  : interact
1 : Pistol

WARNING 
This game have jumpscares and very short
